rajjuruwo ranwan mayurayo lokayehi athiyi wedayena asa baranasa wadisenaga ras karawa “ranwan monaraku dutuwo kawuruda” yi wichara siyalu wadi senanga “api nudutmha, api nudutumha” yi ki kala yata ki wadi puthra ya athin “asuwal parwathayehi ranwan mayurayek atha” yi asa sathutu wa prsada di mayura no mara bada gena tho ma ganewa”yi ema wadi puthruya yawuha.e kala ee wadipith “ohu genemi, dewayeni” yi wahasi kiya himalaya wanayata geාs bodhisathwayan daka paryawathaya sisara ee ee thanhi mala layi; pirithehi aanubhawayen mala pita akmunath bosathanan paya no bande ma ya.
